Polarization¶

class oct.Polarization(mode='sym')¶

Bases: object

Polarization contrast OCT reconstruction

Methods

Initialize self.

classic()

Compute retardance, degree of polarization, and optic axis frames from PS sensitive datasets

clearPadding(img)

Deletes padding if exists

formaThetaOut(oa[, shift])

Format the output oa array to numpy uint8 :param oa: Un-formatted float apparent optic axis array - Scale [-pi,pi] :type oa: array

formatDopOut(dop)

Format the output dop array to numpy uint8 :param dop: Un-formatted float apparent degree of polarization array - Scale [0,1] :type dop: array

Format the output oa array to numpy uint8 :param oa: Un-formatted float apparent optic axis array - Scale [-pi,pi] :type oa: array

Format output contrasts to uint8

formatRetOut(oa[, dn])

Format the output ret array to numpy uint8, according to ps settings
